### Select the entries for 21st century and variables you need

```{r}

my_vars = c("country.name", "year", "startyear", "endyear", 
            "regime.name.",  "reginfo", "notes.to.v3regenddate")

century21_reg <- reg %>% 
  filter(year >= 2000) %>% 
  select(all_of(my_vars)) %>% 
  as.tibble()
```
